mapper.sql: pid, room_type, room_type_name, room_status, description, del_flg, order_num, room_img1, room_img2, room_img3, room_img4, room_img5, room_img6, room_img7, room_infra, adult_cnt, child_cnt, max_extrabed, show_inpage, ctdt, ctuser, updt, upuser
mapper.select:
select
from room_type
del_flg=0
and room_type_name like "%"#{roomTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by order_num
limit #{offset},#{limit};

select count(*) from room_type
del_flg=0
and room_type_name like "%"#{roomTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
select IFNULL(CONCAT('RT', LPAD(RIGHT(MAX(room_type),18)+2,18,'0')),'RT000000000000000001') as roomType from room_type
insert into room_type (pid, room_type, room_type_name, room_status, description, del_flg, order_num, room_img1, room_img2, room_img3, room_img4, room_img5, room_img6, room_img7, room_infra, adult_cnt, child_cnt, max_extrabed, show_inpage, ctdt, ctuser, updt, upuser ) values (#{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomImg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomImg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomImg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomImg4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomImg5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomImg6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomImg7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomInfra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adultCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{childCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxExtrabed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{showInpage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ctuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update room_type
room_type_name = #{roomTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_status = #{roomStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
room_img1 = #{roomImg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_img2 = #{roomImg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_img3 = #{roomImg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_img4 = #{roomImg4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_img5 = #{roomImg5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_img6 = #{roomImg6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_img7 = #{roomImg7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_infra = #{roomInfra,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adult_cnt = #{adultCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
child_cnt = #{childCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_extrabed = #{maxExtrabed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
show_inpage = #{showInpage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ctdt = #{ctdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ctuser = #{ctuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updt = #{updt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upuser = #{upuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and room_type = #{roomType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update room_type set room_type_name = #{roomTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_status = #{roomStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room_img1 = #{roomImg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_img2 = #{roomImg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_img3 = #{roomImg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_img4 = #{roomImg4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_img5 = #{roomImg5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_img6 = #{roomImg6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_img7 = #{roomImg7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_infra = #{roomInfra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adult_cnt = #{adultCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, child_cnt = #{childCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_extrabed = #{maxExtrabed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, show_inpage = #{showInpage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctdt = #{ctdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ctuser = #{ctuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updt = #{updt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upuser = #{upuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and room_type = #{roomType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
